name: part_001
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】AZKi SOLO LiVE 2025 ＂Departure＂【ぴあアリーナMM】 [7UlZnyO79Xg]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: A slideshow loop displaying fan messages and concert information for AZKi SOLO LiVE 2025 'Departure'. Includes an 'Attention' screen regarding concert etiquette.
A commercial for JOYSOUND featuring an animated girl with orange hair speaking about singing karaoke with anime scenes.

subtitles.original: 演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください。声出し応援OKです。
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights. Cheering loudly is OK.

subtitles.original: アニメにハマって、歌いたくなっちゃった。
subtitles.english: I got hooked on anime, and I just had to sing.

subtitles.original: 推しのシーン見ながらカラオケ歌えるなんて…
subtitles.english: To be able to sing karaoke while watching my favorite scenes...
